explore3d.groups
Class DirGroup

java.lang.Object
  javax.media.j3d.SceneGraphObject
      javax.media.j3d.Node
          javax.media.j3d.Group
              javax.media.j3d.TransformGroup
                  explore3d.groups.DirGroup

public class DirGroup
extends javax.media.j3d.TransformGroup

Transform group that puts DoorShapes, PanelShapes and LabelGroups together so that they form a wall with labeled doors for directories.

Author:
J.J. Molenaar, J. Dooper
